name: _life sentence (Simp.Licity team)
description:
Time is irrelevant, but soul is eternal.

During immense amount of years after humanity left their freedom at the mercy of soulless machines after devastating war, their bodies became a main source of fuel, produced from their biomaterial. A cycle was indestructible until this exact day - a day of breaking the chains and cancellation of the life sentence...

Support Simp.Licity at Patreon!
https://www.patreon.com/Simp_Licity

Code: Elastul

Character design and Hentai art: Kirassom (https://twitter.com/Kirassom)

Scene and promo design: rcstp

Scenario and music: Hyouka_Fuwa (https://twitter.com/HyoukaFUwUa)
